summary: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Vidya Balan|Shiney Ahuja|Ameesha Patel|Manoj Joshi|Paresh Rawal|Rasika Joshi|Rajpal Yadav|Asrani|Vikram Gokhale|Vineeth|Tarina Patel|Jimit Trivedi|Kaveri Jha|Hema Malini
title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
